timeline.bodyText: little bit looks weird. The map is static final but modifies the content of the map. Why is it static final?
timeline.author: topolyai5

replies.bodyText: the reference is final and I can initialize it in static initializer block
replies.author: sodre90

replies.bodyText: I understand that, but why do you create the map as static final?
replies.author: topolyai5

replies.bodyText:
because if it is not static then I can not initialize it in static block
It is static because I wanted one instance per JVM
I followed the previous CACHE solution :)
replies.author: sodre90
